description.p: You send down a beacon of moonlight at a target location. It lasts up to 5 minutes, and impacts enemies within its area of effect, dealing 3d4 radiant damage. Depending on the current phase of the moon, the following effect happens.

tr.td: The affected area becomes freezingly cold, and deals additional 1d4 cold damage.
Your allies gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls while inside the affected area.
The ground gets covered with moonfire, and reveals anything and anyone hidden, dispelling their invisibility instantly.
Enemies within the affected area become blinded, and take additional 1d4 psychic damage.
